page.title: 11EDUCATION.TRANSPORT.
page.content: There are no schools within the survey area.School transport is provided for all children of primary age who live more than 2 miles from their school by nearest practicable walking route and for secondary children who live more than 3 miles.The survey area feeds primary schools at Gulworthy, Lamerton and Milton Abbot and the secondary school at Tavistock. A few children are privately educated either locally or at boarding schools. Public transport consists of one market day bus to Tavistock, provided by a private contractor. A community monthly mini bus service to Launceston is being tried. School transport is provided. Most families have their own vehicles, or rely on neighbours. Taxis may be hired from Tavistock.
